alert.note: Alert for Adair (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued August 04 at 10:19PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 415 AM CDT SATURDAY... * WHAT...Flooding caused by excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...Portions of north central Missouri and northeast Missouri, including the following counties, in north central Missouri, Putnam and Sullivan. In northeast Missouri, Adair and Schuyler. * WHEN...Until 415 AM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 1019 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Minor flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly in the advisory area. Between 1 and 2.5 inches of rain have fallen. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 2 inches are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Kirksville, Milan, Green City, Queen City, Novinger, Greentop, Greencastle, Millard, Worthington, Green Castle, Winigan and Kirksville Regional. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
